t: Psalm 72
Give the King Your Justice
Of Solomon.
Give*pn the king your justice, O God, and*ld your righteousness to the royal son!
May*ln he judge your people with righteousness, and*ld your poor with justice!
Let*ln the mountains bear prosperity for the people, and*ld the hills, in righteousness!
May*ln he defend the cause of the poor of the people, give*ld deliverance to the children of the needy, and*ld crush the oppressor!
May*pn they fear you while the sun endures, and*ld as long as the moon, throughout all generations!
May*ln he be like rain that falls on the mown grass, like*ld showers that water the earth!
In*ln his days may the righteous flourish, and*ld peace abound, till the moon be no more!
May*pn he have dominion from sea to sea, and*ld from the River to the ends of the earth!
May*ln desert tribes bow down before him, and*ld his enemies lick the dust!
May*ln the kings of Tarshish and of the coastlands render*ld him tribute; may*ln the kings of Sheba and Seba bring*ld gifts!
May*ln all kings fall down before him, all*ld nations serve him!
For*pn he delivers the needy when he calls, the*ld poor and him who has no helper.
He*ln has pity on the weak and the needy, and*ld saves the lives of the needy.
From*ln oppression and violence he redeems their life, and*ld precious is their blood in his sight.
Long*pn may he live; may*ld gold of Sheba be given to him! May*ln prayer be made for him continually, and*ld blessings invoked for him all the day!
May*ln there be abundance of grain in the land; on*ld the tops of the mountains may it wave; may*ld its fruit be like Lebanon; and*ln may people blossom in the cities like*ld the grass of the field!
May*ln his name endure forever, his*ld fame continue as long as the sun! May*ln people be blessed in him, all*ld nations call him blessed!
Blessed*pn be the Lord,*s the God of Israel, who*ld alone does wondrous things.
Blessed*ln be his glorious name forever; may*ld the whole earth be filled with his glory! Amen*l and Amen!
The*pn prayers of David, the son of Jesse, are ended.
